metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39253 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A crafted NTFS image can cause an out-of-bounds read in ntfs_runlists_merge_i in NTFS-3G < 2021.8.22.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-39253` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ntfs-3g - 1:2013.1.13AR.1-2ubuntu2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ntfs-3g package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2013.1.13AR.1-2ubuntu2+esm1').
